title: didn't receive my rp
body:
i bought 585 rp with dao pay, i succesfully completed the transfer. but i didnt receive my rp.
so i waited like 6 hours but still dont.
can anyone check this or fix the problem? i really want to buy a champ or skin :(
 
thanks in advance,

replies.body: I'm seeing a purchase made for 350 RP that went through today and the RP was recently added to the account, but if there's another payment you made you should definitely hit up our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see about getting that straightened out!
